meta.name: description
meta.value: Read the link component in spoken messages mode.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: The number of identical consecutive links sent.

parameter.name: linkMetadata
parameter.description: Parsed information about the provided URL.

parameter.name: componentContext
parameter.description: Context used for dialoging about given message component

parameter.name: spokenContext
parameter.description: Spoken messages context used for dialoging.
